PlayStation 4

Sandbox Mode

Both Rocket and Spaceplane

Issue 1: Bug

I’ve been playing for 3 or 4 days since downloading. After playing about an hour and configuring several crafts, the “X” button, which starts the engine, stops working. 

Self-Troubleshoot:

1. Loading preloaded rockets and planes, but it doesn’t help.

2. Starting over from Opening page, but that didn’t work.

3. Closing the application and restarting Kerbal, does work. But not a solution.

Issue 2: Question

The L3 button enables the cursor, but the same paddle is also used for steering during flight. Almost every time I try to control the craft, I activate the cursor, losing control of the craft! 

Can this be fixed?

Thanks for your help!

Rob
